name: Double Guardian: Legacy
description:
DOUBLE GUARDIAN

Archieved project

Only for reference pourpose

Prepare your thumbs! Thousands of slimes are coming in endless waves to destroy your crystal and you are the only one to stop them!

Drag two guardians that may only hit enemies of their own color. Guide them towards the enemy waves to protect the life crystal. Play tactically and rely on your wits in order to engage each wave of monsters and come out triumphant. Buy spells, upgrades, themes and even a pet pig that may help you in this quest. Challenge your friends and other players on Leaderboards, Achievements and share your score on twitter and facebook.

Unique pixel art graphics and an exclusive soundtrack drives the right mood to each match creating an immersive experience. Enjoy this action packed game, that successfully blends tower defense and puzzle mechanics.

  •  Colorpuzzle battles;
  •  Endless Survival mode;
  • Strategic gameplay;
  •  Unlock new Maps, Spells, Pet and Upgrades;
  • Boss enemies, bigger and stronger ; 
  • Exclusive soundtrack and sfx;
